semantics.label: Antraštė
semantics.description: Antraštė, kurią norite rodyti virš paveiksliuko

fields.label: Pavadinimas
fields.description: Optional label for a tick. Please make sure it's not too long, or it will be hidden.

fields.label: Garsas
fields.description: Optional audio that plays when an image is shown.

semantics.label: Veikimo nustatymai
semantics.description: Šios parinktys leis jums valdyti, kaip veikia užduotis.

fields.label: Start image
fields.description: Set the number of the image to start with.

fields.label: Snap slider
fields.description: If activated, the slider will snap to an image's position.

fields.label: Display tick marks
fields.description: If activated, the slider bar will display a tick mark for each image.

fields.label: Rodyti pavadinimus
fields.description: If activated, the slider bar will display a label instead of/in addition to tick marks.

fields.label: Transparency Replacement Color
fields.description: Set the color that will replace transparent areas of the images.

fields.label: Image space in fullscreen mode
fields.description: If you have descriptions in addition to the images, set the the percentage of space that the images should use in fullscreen mode.
